name: Slime Invasion (DaveyDark, animefanbhargav)
description:
Slimes are invading the planet and they need to be stopped at all costs!

Made as an entry to the Bullet Hell Game Jam,in 7 days , using pygame

It's a tower defense game but the turrets do not auto shoot. You control one turret at a time. Each turret has a special skill that lasts for 10 seconds can be used once per wave
